dataList.name: Snake Slough
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: all allies gain 2 [DefenseUp].
Each ally gains ([DefenseUp] on self / 4) Offense Level. (max 10)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: All allies gain [DefenseUp] and Offense Level

dataList.name: Snake Slough+
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: all allies gain <style="upgradeHighlight">4</style> [DefenseUp].
Each ally gains ([DefenseUp] on self / <style="upgradeHighlight">3</style>) Offense Level. (max 10)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: All allies gain [DefenseUp] and Offense Level

dataList.name: Snake Slough++
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: all allies gain 4 [DefenseUp].
Each ally gains ([DefenseUp] on self / <style="upgradeHighlight">2</style>) Offense Level. (max 10)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: All allies gain [DefenseUp] and Offense Level

dataList.name: False Halo
dataList.desc:
On Hit, gain 1 [Zazen]. (2 times per Skill)
If this unit was hit by an enemy Skill this turn, gain +1 more [Zazen] each time.

dataList.name: False Halo+
dataList.desc:
On Hit, gain 1 [Zazen]. (<style="upgradeHighlight">3</style> times per Skill)
If this unit was hit by an enemy Skill this turn, gain +1 more [Zazen] each time.

dataList.name: False Halo++
dataList.desc:
On Hit, gain <style="upgradeHighlight">2</style> [Zazen]. (3 times per Skill)
If this unit was hit by an enemy Skill this turn, gain +1 more [Zazen] each time.

dataList.name: Metronome
dataList.desc: In odd-numbered turns, all allies gain 1 [AttackDmgUp]. In even-numbered turns, all allies gain 1 [Protection].

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Enhance allies' attack or defense based on the turn number

dataList.name: Metronome+
dataList.desc: In odd-numbered turns, all allies gain 1 [AttackDmgUp]. In even-numbered turns, all allies gain 1 [Protection] <style="upgradeHighlight">and 1 [DefenseUp]</style>.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Enhance allies' attack or defense based on the turn number

dataList.name: Metronome++
dataList.desc: In odd-numbered turns, all allies gain 1 [AttackDmgUp] <style="upgradeHighlight">and 1 [AttackUp]</style>. In even-numbered turns, all allies gain 1 [Protection] and 1 [DefenseUp].

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Enhance allies' attack or defense based on the turn number

dataList.name: Bridle
dataList.desc: Encounter Start: all allies gain (current Floor x 2)% max HP (max 20%)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: All allies gain max HP based on the current Floor

dataList.name: Bridle+
dataList.desc: Encounter Start: all allies gain (current Floor x <style="upgradeHighlight">3</style>)% max HP (max <style="upgradeHighlight">30</style>%)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: All allies gain max HP based on the current Floor

dataList.name: Bridle++
dataList.desc: Encounter Start: all allies gain (current Floor x <style="upgradeHighlight">5</style>)% max HP (max <style="upgradeHighlight">50</style>%)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: All allies gain max HP based on the current Floor

dataList.name: Contempt of the Gaze of Contempt
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #6 Deployed Identity]

Combat Start: deal +10% damage for every enemy Attack Skill targeting this unit (max 20%)

Combat Start: when targeted by 2+ Attack Skills, deal (# of Skills targeting this unit) fixed HP & SP damage against all enemies targeting this unit. (max 3; this effect does not hurt allies)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal more damage based on # of enemy Skills targeting this unit; deals fixed damage

dataList.name: Contempt of the Gaze of Contempt+
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #6 Deployed Identity]

Combat Start: deal +10% damage for every enemy Attack Skill targeting this unit (max 20%)

Combat Start: when targeted by 2+ Attack Skills, deal <style="upgradeHighlight">(# of Skills targeting this unit x 2)</style> fixed HP & SP damage against all enemies targeting this unit. (max <style="upgradeHighlight">5</style>; this effect does not hurt allies)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal more damage based on # of enemy Skills targeting this unit; deals fixed damage

dataList.name: Contempt of the Gaze of Contempt++
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to <style="upgradeHighlight">#1</style> and #6 Deployed Identities]

Combat Start: deal +10% damage for every enemy Attack Skill targeting this unit (max <style="upgradeHighlight">30</style>%)

Combat Start: when targeted by 2+ Attack Skills, deal (# of Skills targeting this unit x 2) fixed HP & SP damage against all enemies targeting this unit. (max <style="upgradeHighlight">10</style>; this effect does not hurt allies)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal more damage based on # of enemy Skills targeting this unit; deals fixed damage

dataList.name: Unhatched Embers
dataList.desc: When taking mortal damage, fix HP to 1 for the attack; After Attack, heal 20% of max HP. (once per Encounter)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: When taking mortal damage, defy death and heal HP

dataList.name: Unhatched Embers+
dataList.desc:
When taking mortal damage, fix HP to 1 for the attack; After Attack, heal 20% of max HP. (once per Encounter)

<style="upgradeHighlight">If the affected unit has [Combustion]: fix HP to 1 for the attack; After Attack, heal 30% of max HP instead. (once per Encounter for both this and the above effect)</style>

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: When taking mortal damage, defy death and heal HP

dataList.name: Unhatched Embers++
dataList.desc:
When taking mortal damage, fix HP to 1 for the attack; After Attack, heal 20% of max HP. (once per Encounter)

If the affected unit has [Combustion]: fix HP to 1 for the attack; After Attack, heal <style="upgradeHighlight">40</style>% of max HP instead. (once per Encounter for both this and the above effect)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: When taking mortal damage, defy death and heal HP

dataList.name: Anti-Ovine Grounding Plug
dataList.desc: When hit during the combat phase, inflict 1 [Paralysis] against the attacker next turn. (Once per turn for each character)

dataList.name: Anti-Ovine Grounding Plug+
dataList.desc:
When hit during the combat phase, inflict 1 [Paralysis] against the attacker next turn. (Once per turn for each character)

<style="upgradeHighlight">At 5+ Envy A-Reson., at Combat Start: inflict 1 [Paralysis] against all enemies.</style>

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Combat Start: when hit, inflict 1 [Paralysis] next turn

dataList.name: Vestiges of the King
dataList.desc: Chain Battles) Starting from #7 Deployed Sinner, at the start of the same turn it Substitutes in, heal 10 SP, gain 2 [ParryingResultUp], and gain 1 E.G.O resource for each one of their Skills 1, 2, and 3

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Heal SP, gain Clash Power Up, and E.G.O resources when substituting in

dataList.name: Snuffed Lantern
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #7 Deployed Identity]

Gain +1 more [Vibration] Count from Skill or Coin effects

- If the target is in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states, gain +2 more instead

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain more [Vibration] Count with Skill or Coin effects

dataList.name: Snuffed Candlestick
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #1 Deployed Identity]

If there are enemies in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states at Turn Start, inflict 1 [AttackDown] or 1 [DefenseDown] against all enemies. (3 times per turn)

On Hit against enemies in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states: inflict 1 [AttackDown] or 1 [DefenseDown] (3 times per turn)

dataList.name: Shadow Monster
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #1, #2, #7, and #8 Deployed Identities]

Gain +1 more [Vibration] Count from Skill & Coin effects
  - If the target is in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states, gain +2 more instead

If there are enemies in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states at Turn Start, inflict 2 [AttackDown] or 2 [DefenseDown] against all enemies. (3 times per turn)

On Hit against enemies in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states: inflict 1 [AttackDown] or 1 [DefenseDown] (3 times per turn between all Identities)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain more [Vibration] Count with Skill or Coin effects

dataList.name: Packaging Box
dataList.desc:
On Hit from ally Skills) randomly select one of the following effects: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], and [Sinking], then inflict 1 Potency of the selected effect (3 times per turn)

On Kill from allies) randomly select one of the following effects: [Breath] Count, [Charge] Count, [Agility], [AttackUp], and [DefenseUp], then inflict 1 of the selected effect to a random ally (3 times per turn)

dataList.name: Packaging Ribbon
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: randomly select 1 out of 'Wrath ~ Envy DMG Up' effects and apply 1 Stack to all allies

Turn Start: randomly select 1 out of 'Wrath ~ Envy Fragility' effects and inflict 1 Stack to all enemies

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain a random Affinity DMG Up effect

dataList.name: Gift
dataList.desc:
When an ally hits with a Skill, randomly select 2 of the following effects: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], and [Sinking], then inflict 1 Potency of the selected effect (3 times per turn)

When an ally hits with a Skill, randomly select one of the following effects: [Breath] Count, [Charge] Count, [Agility], [AttackUp], and [DefenseUp], then inflict 1 of the selected effect to 2 random allies (3 times per turn)

Turn Start: randomly select 2 out of 'Wrath ~ Envy DMG Up' effects and apply 1 Stack to all allies

Turn Start: randomly select 2 out of 'Wrath ~ Envy Fragility' effects and inflict 1 Stack to all enemies

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain a random Affinity DMG Up effect

dataList.name: Jolly Plushie
dataList.desc:
Gain 2 [Breath] Potency next turn based on the number of allied Attack Skills that dealt damage by Turn End
- In Focused Encounters, gain 4 [Breath] Potency instead.

Turn Start: apply 2 [Breath], +2 [Breath] Count, and 2 [Protection] on the ally with the least HP.

Deal +(absolute value of SP)% damage. (min 0%)

When an ally with Plus Coin Skills recovers from Stagger, fully heal SP. (does not activate when Corroded)

For an ally with all Minus Coin Skills: gain 5 [Paralysis] at Turn Start.

dataList.name: Implicit Contract Renewal
dataList.desc: If there are no surviving [RequestedTarget], inflict the [RequestedTarget] effect against the first enemy to be attacked by an ally. (once per turn)

dataList.name: Darkflame Smoking Pipe
dataList.desc:
[Effect applies only to #1 Deployed Identity]

Gain 2 [Enhancement] and 1 [Vulnerable] every turn

If the main target currently has a reduced Defense Level, gain 5 [Breath] before attack

Pride Pierce Skills deal +(50 / # of Coins)% damage (including E.G.O)

dataList.name: Equalizer
dataList.desc: If the target has 1.5 or lower Pierce Resistance, Pierce Resistance +0.3

dataList.name: Swift Command
dataList.desc:
Turn End: if any allies Retreated this turn, 1 ally with the fastest Speed gains 2 [Enhancement] and 1 [AttackDmgUp] at the next Turn Start

Combat Start: if any allies were Substituted in this turn, allies that were Substituted in gain 2 [Enhancement] and 2 [Endurance]

dataList.name: Gear Shrapnel
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: if this unit has [Breath], gain 2 [DefenseUp] and 1 [Endurance]

If this unit has [Breath], the first Coin to hit deals +10% damage

If the said Coin hits critically, +20% Damage on Critical Hit

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal more damage with the first Coin that hits

dataList.name: CQC Manual
dataList.desc:
If a Skill that can spend [Bullet] does not spend [Bullet], gain 1 [Enhancement] this turn and next turn (once per turn)

When gaining [Bullet], Skill 3 deals +50% damage this turn and next turn when used

When using a Skill that spends [Bullet], gain 3 [Breath] and +1 [Breath] Count

dataList.name: Combustion Gloves
dataList.desc:
On Clash Win with a Base Attack Skill that inflicts [Combustion] Potency or 'Unique Burn', inflict 2 [Combustion] Potency (2 times per turn per Identity)

On Clash Win with a Base Attack Skill that inflicts [Combustion] Count, inflict +2 [Combustion] Count (3 times per turn per enemy)

Base Attack Skills that inflict [Combustion] Potency, Count, or 'Unique Burn': each Skill gains Offense Level equal to the number of copies of each Skill(max 3).
- If a Skill has 3+ copies, gain 2 additional Offense Level.

dataList.name: Spiked Combat Boots
dataList.desc:
On Clash Win with a Base Attack Skill that inflicts [Burst] Potency or Count against an enemy, inflict +3 [Burst] Count (2 times per turn per enemy)

On Hit: if the enemy does not have [Burst], Coin effects that inflict [Burst] Potency inflict [Burst] Count instead (max 4; 2 times per turn per enemy; for Abnormalities, for each Part)

Base Attack Skills that inflict [Burst] Potency or Count: each Skill gains Offense Level equal to the number of copies of each Skill(max 3).
- If a Skill has 3+ copies, gain 2 additional Offense Level.

dataList.name: Re-ignition Plug
dataList.desc:
Base Attack Skills that inflict [Combustion] Count: deal +20% damage and inflict +1 more [Combustion] Count. On Hit with these Skills against enemies with [Combustion] or 'Unique Burn': inflict 1 [DefenseDown] (2 times per turn per Identity)

Identities whose all Base Attack Skills inflict [Combustion] Potency, Count, or 'Unique Burn': at Turn Start, gain [AttackUp] equal to the number of surviving turns (except for the turn they join the Encounter; max 5)

dataList.name: Enhancer Mk.4
dataList.desc:
On Hit with the final Coin against enemies with 15- [Burst] Potency when using a Base Attack Skill that inflicts [Burst] Potency or Count: inflict +3 [Burst] Count (once per turn per Identity)

Base Attack Skills that inflict [Burst] Count: Clash Power +1, deal +20% damage

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain Clash Power and deal more damage

dataList.name: Embers
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: all enemies(for Abnormalities, all Parts) with 2~7 [Combustion] Count gain 1~2 [Combustion] Count.

When enemies take 5 hits from ally Attack Skills(including E.G.O Skills) that inflict [Combustion] Potency, Count, or 'Unique Burn': trigger [Combustion] once, then reduce [Combustion] Count by 1 (2 times per turn per enemy; for Abnormalities, for each Part)

dataList.name: Twigs
dataList.desc:
Every time [Burst] activates 3 times on enemies with [Burst] due to getting hit by allies' Attack Skills(including E.G.O Skills) that inflict [Burst] Potency or Count, inflict 2 [AttackDown] on the said enemy next turn (3 times per turn per enemy; for Abnormalities, for each Part)

On Kill with a Base Attack Skill that inflicts [Burst] Count: inflict the remaining [Burst] Count on the defeated enemy on a random enemy next turn (2 times per turn)

dataList.name: Regular Operational Gear
dataList.desc:
Limbus Company Identities: Skill 2 gains Offense Level +1 and deals +15% damage; Skill 3 gains Offense Level +2 and deals +30% damage

If there are 4+ Limbus Company Identities among the Backup Units, 2 random allies gain 2 [AttackUp] at Turn Start

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain Offense Level and deal more damage

dataList.name: Operation Authorization Card
dataList.desc:
During the Encounter, when an ally retreats or is defeated, randomly apply 3 [AttackUp] between all Identities at next Turn Start. (2 times per turn)
- When 3+ allies retreat or are defeated, randomly apply 6 [AttackUp] between all Identities at next Turn Start instead. (2 times per turn)

Turn Start: 3 allies with the lowest SP heals 15, 10, and 5 SP each (does not stack; the numbers apply in the ascending order; does not activate if the affected units are Panicked or Corroded)

dataList.name: High-risk Operational Gear
dataList.desc:
Limbus Company Identities: Skill 2 gains Offense Level +2 and deals +20% damage; Skill 3 gains Offense Level +3 and deals +40% damage

Turn Start: a random ally gains 2 [AttackUp] for every Backup or defeated Limbus Company Identities.

During the Encounter, when an ally retreats or is defeated, randomly apply 3 [AttackUp] between all Identities at next Turn Start. (distributed equally, 2 times per turn)
- When 3+ allies retreat or are defeated, randomly apply 6 [AttackUp] between all Identities at next Turn Start instead. (2 times per turn)
- When 3+ Limbus Company Identities retreat or are defeated, randomly apply 8 [AttackUp] between all Identities instead.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain Offense Level and deal more damage
Randomly apply Offense Level Up between allies
Randomly apply Offense Level Up between allies

dataList.name: Hardwood Liquor Cup
dataList.desc:
On Clash Lose, gain 1 [Protection] and heal 3~6 SP (once per turn per Identity)

When attacking an enemy with the [SuperCoin]'s effect of the Skill(except E.G.O Skills) that lost the Clash: 
- Plus Coin Skills receive Plus Coin Power +(3 / # of Coins) and deal +20% damage (min. Plus Coin Power gain 1)
- Minus Coin Skills deal +40% damage

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain Coin Power and deal more damage

dataList.name: Worn Hilt
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: all allies gain 1 [ScarletResultUp].

Blade Lineage or Kurokumo Clan Identities gain 2 [ScarletResultUp] and 1 [SlashResultUp] instead.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain Lust Power Up and Slash Power Up

dataList.name: Resplendence
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: activates when there are 3 or more Kurokumo Clan Identities. (only counts Identities on the field)

All allies gain 2 [ScarletResultUp] and 1 [SlashResultUp] at Turn Start.

Kurokumo Clan Identities' Base Attack Skills: gain Coin Power +(4 / # of Coins; min. 1), inflict an additional 1 [Laceration], +1 [Laceration] Count, and deal +(80/# of Coins)% damage

Nullify Kurokumo Clan Identities' first Stagger Threshold; at less than 50% HP, gain 2 [Protection] at Turn Start. Identities that took damage from enemies this turn gain 2 [Agility] next turn.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain Lust Power Up and Slash Power Up
Gain Coin Power, inflict more Bleed and Bleed Count, and deal more damage
Nullify the first Stagger Threshold; gain Protection at under certain HP; gain Haste after taking damage

dataList.name: Cultivation
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: activates when there are 3 or more Blade Lineage Identities. (only counts Identities on the field)

Turn Start: all allies gain 2 [SlashResultUp], and deal +35% damage.

Turn Start: when a Blade Lineage Identity hits critically, deal additional Pride damage equal to ([Breath] Potency / 2) on self.

If a Blade Lineage Identity has 30+ [Breath] Potency at Turn End, consume 10 [Breath] Potency and gain 2 [SlashDamageUp] next turn

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain Slash Power Up and deal more damage
Deal an additional ([Breath] Potency/2) Pride damage.

dataList.name: Swarmcloud
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: activates when there are 3 or more Kurokumo Clan Identities. (only counts Identities on the field)

On Hit with Base Attack Skill(except E.G.O Skills)'s [SuperCoin]: deal +(40/# of Coins)% damage
Kurokumo Clan Identities: deal +(80/# of Coins)% damage instead

Kurokumo Clan Identities with Slash Base Attack Skills: gain 2 [SlashDamageUp] at Turn Start. Kurokumo Clan Identities gain 1 [AttackUp] and 1 [DefenseUp] next turn for every 10% missing HP on self at Turn End. (max 5 each)

When a Kurokumo Clan Identity dies, all Kurokumo Clan Identities gain 2 [AttackDmgUp] next turn (once per turn)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain Slash DMG Up, Offense Level Up, and Defense Level Up

dataList.name: Enh. Tattoos - The Middle
dataList.desc:
Blunt Skills: Clash Power +1
- The Middle Identities: gain Clash Power +1 and Coin Power +1 instead
- The Middle Identities: if the main target has [RetaliationBook], gain Clash Power +1, Coin Power +1, and deal +10% damage instead

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain Clash Power. The Middle Identities gain Coin Power and deal more damage as well

dataList.name: Strange Glyph Talisman
dataList.desc:
When defeating a target with [Burst](for Focused Encounters, a Part) with an Attack Skill, inflict the [Burst] Potency on the target between all enemies(for Focused Encounters, all Parts) (max 2 per enemy, rounded down)

When defeating a target with [BurstAgility](for Focused Encounters, a Part) with an Attack Skill, inflict the [Burst] Potency and Count on the target between all enemies(for Focused Encounters, all Parts) (max 2 per enemy, rounded down)

dataList.name: Harestride
dataList.desc: If an ally's Speed is faster than the target's, the ally inflicts (Speed difference / 3) additional [Burst] or [Burst] Count when inflicting them with Skills (max 3)

dataList.name: Chains of Loyalty
dataList.desc:
When hit, all allies in the same faction deal +5% more Blunt damage (15% per turn)

For The Middle Identities, gain 1 [AttackUp] and deal +10% more Blunt damage instead (3 per turn, 30% per turn)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal more Blunt damage. The Middle Identities gain Offense Level Up as well

dataList.name: Strange Glyph Inscriptions
dataList.desc:
When clashing against targets with [Burst], gain ([Burst] on the target / 20) Clash Power (max 2)
- When clashing against targets with [BurstAgility], gain ([Burst] on the target / 15) Clash Power instead (max 3)

When dealing damage with [BurstAgility] effect, deal fixed damage by ([BurstAgility] damage / 3)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal additional damage when dealing damage with Heishou - Mao Talisman

dataList.name: Shadow Bamboo Hat
dataList.desc:
Turn End: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Identities gain 2 [Agility] next turn

If an ally's Speed is faster than the target's, or when activating Unopposed Attacks, deal +10% more Slash damage for every (Speed difference / 3) (max 30%)

If an ally's Speed is faster than the target's, take -10% damage for every (Speed difference / 3) (max 30%)

dataList.name: Everlasting Chains of Bond
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: activates when there are 2 or more The Middle Identities (only counts Identities on the field)

When hit, all allies in the same faction deal +5% more Blunt damage (15% per turn)
The Middle Identities gain 1 [AttackUp] and deal +10% more Blunt damage instead (3 per turn, 30% per turn)

Blunt Skills gain Base Power +1
- The Middle Identities gain Base Power +1 and Coin Power +1 instead
- If the target has [RetaliationBook], The Middle Identities gain Base Power +1, Coin Power +1, and deal +30% damage instead

The Middle Identities gain Min Speed +1 and Max Speed +1 for the Encounter

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal more Blunt damage. The Middle Identities gain Offense Level Up as well

dataList.name: Glyph of Glass Shards
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: activates when there are 5 or more Identities that inflict [Burst] Potency or [Burst] Count (except E.G.O Skills)

When defeating a target with [Burst](for Focused Encounters, a Part) with an Attack Skill, inflict the [Burst] Potency on the target between all enemies(for Focused Encounters, all Parts) (max 3 per enemy)

When defeating a target with [BurstAgility](for Focused Encounters, a Part) with an Attack Skill, inflict the [Burst] Potency and Count on the target between all enemies(for Focused Encounters, all Parts) (max 6 per enemy)

When clashing against targets with [Burst], gain ([Burst] on the target / 20) Clash Power (max 2)
- When clashing against targets with [BurstAgility], gain ([Burst] on the target / 10) Coin Power instead (max 2)

When dealing damage with [BurstAgility] effect, deal fixed damage by ([BurstAgility] damage / 2)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal additional damage when dealing damage with Heishou - Mao Talisman

dataList.name: Swishing Fuel Tank
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #2, #4 Deployed Identities]

When taking lethal damage, 60% chance to not take that damage and heal 30 HP. (once per Encounter)
The above effect does not activate under the following conditions:
- When the Skill damage taken exceeds the unit's max HP
- When the unit has the HP Healing Down effect
